elements.name: my-switch
elements.description:
Switches allow the user to toggle an option on or off.

**Slots:**
 - **checked** - Displays when switch is on
- **unchecked** - Displays when switch is off

**Events:**
 - **switch-change** - Emitted when switch is toggled

**CSS Properties:**
 - **--size** - Controls the size of the switch _(default: 1rem)_

**CSS Parts:**
 - **control** - controls styles for the switch button
- **track** - controls styles for the switch track
- **checked** - controls styles for the switch track when checked
- **switch** - controls styles for the switch

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Adds a description for the switch

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Used to determine if the switch is on or off

attributes.name: label-position
attributes.description: Identifies where in relation to the switch the label should be placed

properties.name: label
properties.description: Adds a description for the switch

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Used to determine if the switch is on or off

properties.name: label-position
properties.description: Identifies where in relation to the switch the label should be placed

properties.name: --size
properties.description: Controls the size of the switch

pseudo-elements.name: part(control)
pseudo-elements.description: controls styles for the switch button

pseudo-elements.name: part(track)
pseudo-elements.description: controls styles for the switch track

pseudo-elements.name: part(checked)
pseudo-elements.description: controls styles for the switch track when checked
